questions.question_text: Ane e Bhagwān āpaṇne hāthīe besāḍe to hāthīe besīne rājī rahevu ane gadheḍe besāḍe to ______ besīne rājī rahevu.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Pa.74, one should be content whether Bhagwān seats us on an elephant or a donkey.

questions.question_text: Jo mār mār karato koī āvato hoy to em samajavu je, ‘______ ja karyu sarve thāy chhe, paṇ te vinā koīnu halāvyu pānaḍu paṇ halatu nathī.’
questions.explanation: According to Swa.Vato.1/88, one should understand that everything is the work of our Swami.

questions.question_text: Bhagwān to potānā bhaktanī ______ karavāmā ja beṭhā chhe.
questions.explanation: According to Swa.Vato.1/22, Bhagwān is always protecting his devotees.

questions.question_text: Kenī peṭhe? To jem pāpaṇ ānkhanī rakṣhā kare chhe ne hāth ______ rakṣhā kare chhe ne māvatar chhokarānī rakṣhā kare chhe ne rājā prajānī rakṣhāmā chhe, tem ja Bhagwān āpaṇī rakṣhāmā chhe.
questions.explanation: According to Swa.Vato.1/22, just as the eyelid protects the eye and the hand protects the throat, Bhagwān protects us.

questions.question_text: āpaṇe jyāre tan-man-dhan Bhagwānne arpaṇ karyu tyāre have Bhagwānnī ______ te ja āpaṇu prārabdha chhe, te vinā bīju koī prārabdha nathī.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.An.13, when we offer our body, mind, and wealth to Bhagwān, then Bhagwān's will is our destiny.

questions.question_text: Māṭe Bhagwānnī ichchhāe karīne game tevu ______ āve, temā koī rīte akaḷāī javu nahī
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.An.13, we should not be discouraged by whatever happiness or sorrow comes according to Bhagwān's will.

questions.question_text: Antarmā ṭāḍhu rahyā kare ne dhagī na jāy tenā be upāy chhe: ek to ______ karavu ne bīju Bhagwānne sarva-kartā samajavā ne temā sukh āve to sukh bhogavī levu ne dukh āve to dukh bhogavī levu.
questions.explanation: According to Swa.Vato.1/148, one way to remain cool and not be burned is to do bhajan of Bhagwān.

questions.question_text: Antarmā ṭāḍhu rahyā kare ne dhagī na jāy tenā be upāy chhe: ek to Bhagwānnu bhajan karavu ne bīju ______ samajavā ne temā sukh āve to sukh bhogavī levu ne dukh āve to dukh bhogavī levu.
questions.explanation: According to Swa.Vato.1/148, one way to remain cool and not be burned is to understand Bhagwān as the all-doer.

questions.question_text: Dhiraj Akhyan: Je dukhe thāy sukh janne, te de chhe dukh ______ |
questions.explanation: From Dhiraj Akhyan: 'Je dukhe thāy sukh janne, te de chhe dukh dayā kari'.

questions.question_text: Dhiraj Akhyan: jeha sukhe dukh upaje, te āpe nahi ______ hari ||
questions.explanation: From Dhiraj Akhyan: 'jeha sukhe dukh upaje, te āpe nahi kedi hari'.
